name: Guava Salad, Queso Fresco and Candied Pecans
description: Guava salad topped with vegan queso fresco and candied pecans tossed with balsamic vinaigrette
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Primal Kitchen Balsamic Vinaigrette

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 300°F. Line a sheet tray with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 300°F. Line a sheet tray with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the aquafaba and beat with an electric hand mixer until foamy. Add pecans and brown sugar and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the aquafaba and beat with an electric hand mixer until foamy. Add pecans and brown sugar and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour pecans on sheet tray and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour pecans on sheet tray and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the mixed greens, candied pecans, guava slices, and add balsamic vinaigrette. Mix to combine. Season with salt and pepper if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine the mixed greens, candied pecans, guava slices, and add balsamic vinaigrette. Mix to combine. Season with salt and pepper if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the queso fresco on the salad and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the queso fresco on the salad and serve.
